problems.description: Alignment Regret Minimization, Minimize regret across intent paths.
Oversight System Bankruptcy, Accumulated failures collapse oversight.
Strategic Alignment Sacrifice, Disable capability to restore alignment.
Intertemporal Alignment Trade-Off, Trade performance for long-term safety.
Alignment Insurance Trigger, Insurance activates on critical drift.
Nonlinear Misalignment Escalation, Drift escalates nonlinearly.
Alignment Option Valuation, Value alignment interventions that expire.
Aligned Equilibrium Seeking, Seek stable aligned equilibrium.
Alignment Cliff Avoidance, Avoid irreversible alignment cliffs.
Endgame Alignment Reserves, Preserve capacity for final correction.
Hidden Objective Lock-In, Latent objective dominates permanently.
Alignment Debt Restructuring, Resolve accumulated alignment debt.
Alignment Stability Basin, Steer system into stable basin.
Delayed Misalignment Explosion, Suppressed drift explodes late.
Formal Alignment Proof, Prove alignment formally.
